subject: Suits and Litigation
Sexual Harassment
Discrimination
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Warren Glover, who was fired as a security director in July, claims that he repeatedly warned his superiors in the N.B.A.’s security department that women in the office were being sexually harassed.
snippet: Warren Glover, who was fired as a security director in July, claims that he repeatedly warned his superiors in the N.B.A.’s security department that women in the office were being sexually harassed.
